TrailBone: Reference to the active bone in the hierarchy to modify.
ChainLength: Number of bones above the active one in the hierarchy to modify. ChainLength should be at least 2.
ChainBoneAxis: Axis of the bones to point along trail.
MaxDeltaTime: To avoid hitches causing stretch of trail, you can use MaxDeltaTime to clamp the long delta time. If you want 30 fps to set it to 0.03333f ( = 1/30 ).
TrailRelaxationSpeed: How quickly we 'relax' the bones to their animated positions. Time 0 will map to top root joint, time 1 will map to the bottom joint.
PlanarLimits: List of available planar limits for this node
StretchLimit: If bLimitStretch is true, this indicates how long a bone can stretch beyond its length in the ref-pose.
BaseJoint: Base Joint to calculate velocity from. If none, it will use Component's World Transform. .
LastBoneRotationAnimAlphaBlend:
How to set last bone rotation. It copies from previous joint if alpha is 0.f, or 1.f will use animated pose
       * This alpha dictates the blend between parent joint and animated pose, and how much you'd like to use animated pose for
LODThreshold:
* Max LOD that this node is allowed to run
* For example if you have LODThreshold to be 2, it will run until LOD 2 (based on 0 index)
* when the component LOD becomes 3, it will stop update/evaluate
* currently transition would be issue and that has to be re-visited
Alpha: Current strength of the skeletal control
bInvertChainBoneAxis: Invert the direction specified in ChainBoneAxis.
bLimitStretch: Limit the amount that a bone can stretch from its ref-pose length.
bLimitRotation: Limit the amount that a bone can stretch from its ref-pose length.
bActorSpaceFakeVel: Whether 'fake' velocity should be applied in actor or world space.
bReorientParentToChild: Fix up rotation to face child for the parent
bEnableDebug: Enable Debug in the PIE. This doesn't work in game
